About this site

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(rjson)
library(reactable)

indicators_dir <- "../indicators/"

fls <- indicators_dir |> list.files(full.names = TRUE, pattern = "json") 

indicators_dt <- list()

for(i in seq_along(fls)) {

    json_data <- fls[i] |>
        readLines() |>
        paste(collapse = "") |>
        fromJSON()

    json_data$keywords <- json_data$keywords |> paste(collapse = ", ")

    indicators_dt[[i]] <- json_data

}

indicators_dt <- indicators_dt |> rbindlist(idcol = "id", use.names = TRUE, fill = TRUE)

reactable(indicators_dt)
```
